└───── Should be true
❝ ok false
└───── One is love
❝ equal

└───── One two
❝ notEqual

└───── Blooper
❝ deepEqual 
{
  "a" : {
    "b" : [1m3[0m[1m // != 1[0m

}

❝ notDeepEqual 
{
  "a" : 1
}
└───── Dont be like that
